original_text: And there was again war at Gath, where there was a man of great stature, who had six fingers on each hand, and six toes on each foot, twenty-four in number, and he also was descended from the giants.
korean_text: 또 가드에서 전쟁할 때에 그 곳에 키가 큰 자 하나는 손가락과 발가락이 각기 여섯 개씩 모두 스물 네 개가 있는데 그도 거인족의 소생이라

sentences.original_text: And there was again war at Gath,
where there was a man of great stature,
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 키가 아주 큰 사람이 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: who had six fingers on each hand,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 각 손에가 여섯 손가락을 가졌고,

sentences.original_text: and six toes on each foot,
and he also was descended from the giants.
